About Me


Hello! My name is Eric Wood, and this is my website.

I’m an avid coder, guitarist, biker, dog walker, and many other things. I live in the wonderful city of Austin, Texas.

Ever since I wrote my first <marquee> tag in middle school, I’ve been hooked on web development and programming in general. I’ve thoroughly cut my teeth on TI BASIC (although it’s no longer on my resume) and the rest is history I guess.

Currently I work as a UI application developer at Spiceworks where I practice the dark arts of CSS, JavaScript, and Ruby on Rails.

You should check out the stuff I have on my Github account.
